summary: First mod. A small dwarven dungeon the leads to a house.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. I have just started modding skyrim and I like it. Anyways to the mod. Its the beginning of a dwarven dungeon that I still have a lot of work on. This dungeon will in the end have a nice dwarven house at the end of the dungeon, but don't worry I'l add a door somewhere outside the dungeon to get into the house when you get the key, I'll also make it a kind of hard dungeon to finish. :)

The entrance is across the river at riverwood.

Going to try to make it as lore friendly as possible.

Also remember to back up everything as it is a Beta and anything can go wrong.
author: aqw409

files.name: Dwarven Dungeon
files.changelogHtml:
BETA Version 0.2
-Added NavMesh
-Added some enemies. (2 bandits and 9 Dwarven Spiders,2 Dwarven Spheres, 1 Dwarven centurion)
-Added a ton of new areas but still adding more and doors to the bottom left. (not going to spoil it)
-Added a few chests/barrels and 2 hidden chests.
-Moved the dead Centurion and added fire under neither him.
-Added a ton of Static Dwarven Spiders.
-Added 3 dead Dwarven Spiders.
-Added a warning stone out front of the building. (still across from Riverwood)
-Added a lot of rubble on one corner, also (SPOILER) added a hidden chest behind it. Tell me if you can get in!!!!
-A lot more to come guys.

files.name: Dwarven Dungeon
files.changelogHtml:
Beta Version 0.3
-Added more NavMesh
-Added more areas (working on another)
-Added more lights and flames
-Added a armory types room
-Added a lever to open top level door (right turn at the first intersection)
-Added a few more enemies in some areas
-Added a few more dead things including burnt corpses
-Fixed texture glitches in some of the hallways
-Working on a load door as the "last" area in the first section. [door+room(s)]
-Added some fire on the higher level around the rubble
-Still working on lighting and other things to make it looks better

files.name: Dwarven Dungeon
files.changelogHtml:
Beta Version 0.4
-Fixed the scripts for the welcome stone and the doors
-Added a few enemies
-Added a few more areas
-Added a few more dead enemies
-Added a few traps
-Moved around a few areas since they were creating visual bugs
-Don't remember what else....
-Currently working on the next area
